#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{	char s[200],s1[200],temp[200];
	int t,n,i,k;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{     cin>>n;
	      strcpy(s,"");
	      if(n>25)
	      {	
	
		
		while(n>=1)
		{    
		    
		   k=-1;
		    if(n>=25)
		    {		strcpy(s1,"");
		     		for(i=26;i>=1;i--)
                     		{       s1[++k]=char(i+96);
                     		}
		    }
		    else
		    {		strcpy(s1,"");
				for(i=n+1;i>=1;i--)
                     		{       s1[++k]=char(i+96);
                     		}
		    }

		    n=n-25;
     		    strcpy(temp,"");
		    strncat(temp,s1,k+1);
		    strncat(temp,s,strlen(s));
		    strcpy(s,"");
		    strcpy(s,temp); 	 			 
		    
		} 	
		for(i=0;i<strlen(s);i++)
			cout<<s[i];
		cout<<endl;
		
	    }
	      else
	      {	
			for(i=n+1;i>=1;i--)
			{	printf("%c",i+96);
			}
			cout<<endl;
	      }		  	
	}
	return 0;
}
